title: Making shoes (TEFC)
brief_description: This film aims to show school children how shoes are manufactured in a modern American factory. It traces the entire process from cutting the leather, through assembly of the various parts of the shoe, to the final polishing and packing.
description: This film aims to show school children how shoes are manufactured in a modern American factory. It traces the entire process from cutting the leather, through assembly of the various parts of the shoe, to the final polishing and packing.
